survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Gen Z employees regarding digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use in your workplace?
answer_options: Google Workspace (e.g., Google Meet, Google Docs)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE, include text box for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use in your workplace?
answer_options: Google Workspace (e.g., Google Meet, Google Docs)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a digital collaboration tool?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple features. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE, include text box for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a digital collaboration tool?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your workplace's digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with a 5-point frequency scale.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your workplace's digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools used in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools used in your workplace?
